quiz.prompt: Which learning paradigm requires labelled examples?
quiz.explanation: Supervised learning uses labelled data to learn mappings between inputs and outputs.

options.feedback: Correct! Labelled data is the hallmark of supervised learning.
Unsupervised learning works with unlabelled data.
Reinforcement learning uses rewards and penalties instead of labelled examples.
